grid » yaspgrid

grids.hh File Reference

Detailed Description

This is the basis for the yaspgrid implementation of the Dune grid interface.

#include <iostream>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
#include <deque>
#include <mpi.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <dune/common/fvector.hh>
#include <dune/common/stdstreams.hh>
